tasks.label: Boot iOS Simulator
tasks.command: if xcrun simctl list devices booted | grep -q 'Booted'; then echo 'iOS Simulator already running'; else DEVICE=$(xcrun simctl list devices available | grep -i 'iphone' | head -1 | awk -F'(' '{print $1}' | xargs); if [ -z "$DEVICE" ]; then open -a Simulator && echo 'Opening Simulator app...'; else open -a Simulator && sleep 2 && xcrun simctl boot "$DEVICE" 2>/dev/null && echo "Booting $DEVICE..." || echo 'Simulator booting...'; fi; sleep 3; fi

tasks.label: Boot Android Emulator
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceFolder}/example && if flutter devices | grep -q 'android'; then echo 'Android emulator already running'; else flutter emulators --launch Medium_Phone_API_35 && sleep 12; fi
